recipe.title: Cucumber, Tomato, and Pineapple Salad with Asian Dressing
ingredients: 1 (2-inch-long) fresh serrano or jalapeño chile, minced, including seeds
1/2 seedless cucumber (often plastic-wrapped), halved lengthwise, then thinly sliced crosswise
1/2 pineapple, peeled, quartered lengthwise, cored, then sliced crosswise 1/4 inch thick (2 cups)
2 medium tomatoes (1 lb total), cut into 1/2-inch-thick wedges
instructions: Mince garlic, then mash to a paste with salt using side of a large heavy knife. Whisk together lime juice and sugar in a large bowl until sugar is dissolved, then whisk in oil, garlic paste, chile, and fish sauce (to taste). Add remaining ingredients, tossing to coat, and add salt to taste.
